thread.title: BRIEF-Braeside Investments Enters Into Nomination, Support And Standstill Agreement With Spok Holdings

title: BRIEF-Braeside Investments Enters Into Nomination, Support And Standstill Agreement With Spok Holdings
text:
April 12, 2018 / 12:59 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Braeside Investments Enters Into Nomination, Support And Standstill Agreement With Spok Holdings Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Spok Holdings Inc: 
* ON APRIL 11, BRAESIDE INVESTMENTS ENTERED INTO NOMINATION, SUPPORT AND STANDSTILL AGREEMENT WITH SPOK HOLDINGS INC * SEC FILING 
* AGREED TO CERTAIN CUSTOMARY “STANDSTILL” PROVISIONS FOR DURATION OF “SUPPORT PERIOD” 
* UNDER TERMS OF NOMINATION AGREEMENT, CO HAVE AGREED TO MAINTAIN BENEFICIAL OWNERSHIP OF AT LEAST 950,873 SHARES OF SPOK HOLDINGS 
* DURING SUPPORT PERIOD, CO HAVE ALSO AGREED NOT TO ACQUIRE MORE THAN 19.99% OF SPOK HOLDINGS’ OUTSTANDING SHARES 
* IF STEIN UNABLE TO SERVE TERM AS DIRECTOR, BRAESIDE INVESTMENTS MAY PROPOSE STEVEN MCINTYRE BE APPOINTED TO SERVE AS HIS SUCCESSOR Source text : bit.ly/2qsSEck Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
